about_the_game:
How to change from weak to strong,

It is necessary to strive to seize every opportunity. When the enemy's generals are fatigued and incompetent, try to set traps to lower their morale, reduce their attack power, and halve their damage,

At this point, we worked hard to win. When the enemy needs certain resources, they can try to engage in close and distant attacks, provide resources to form an alliance and jointly attack. When the enemy and treacherous officials lead the way,

You can try to bribe and conspire to become our spy. When the enemy does not resist during the attack, our side gradually erodes.

1. It is necessary to select suitable targets based on the "strength value" of each alliance, and special skills are required for targets with equivalent "strength value", otherwise the attack may fail.

2. Special skills need to be used according to the "harmonious", "resources", and "intelligence" of each alliance. When the "harmonious" is less than 100, the "trap" skill can be used,

When the "resources" is less than 100, the "support" skill can be used, and when the "intelligence" is less than 100, the "bribery" skill can be used. Every time a special skill is used,

The corresponding "harmonious", "resources", and "intelligence" are increased by 25. When they are equal to 100, special skills cannot be used.

3. Click on the planet to view the alliance and planet properties.
